dialogue: You seem a bit young to be alone... Are your parents near?
I'm NOT a little sapling!! I'm a grown-up spirit, okay?
My granny already left Heartland, so I'm followng her.
It's all because of that old Root! He's such a meanie!
I'm FINE! I can do it myself!!
I hope my mom is okay in this fire...
Let's hurry and find her together, Bean
